sub_title: Assistant Professor at TU/e | Integrated Photonics R&D
summary: I am an scientist with passion for photonics and its applications. I understand innovation as the result of vivid imagination - a transformative process in which creativity is essential.

projects.title: OIP4NWE - Open Innovation Photonics pilot for North West Europe (Interreg NWE)
projects.description: The Interreg NWE-Project “OIP4NWE” aims at establishing an open innovation pilot line for the manufacturing of Photonic Integrated Circuits. The project targets increasing the technology readiness level through improving fabrication processes, automation and scaling.

contributors.headline: Assistant Professor at TU/e | Integrated Photonics R&D

projects.title: NAVOLCHI (FP7)
projects.description: NAVOLCHI is an FP7-funded European project that explores, develops and demonstrates a novel nano-scale plasmonic chip-to-chip and system-in-package interconnection platform to overcome the bandwidth, foot-print and power consumption limitations of today's electrical and optical interconnect solutions.

projects.title: IMPRESS (FP7)
projects.description: The objective of the FP7 European project IMPRESS is to facilitate the development of new manufacturing routes of different technologies in polymer for micro- and nanoscale features. Part of this technology consists of an optical metrology tool based on scatterometry to characterize the nanofabrication.

profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor on Integrated Photonic Sensors

profile_positions.description: Contributing to establish the national Photonic Integration Technology Centre (PITC) under the umbrella of the PhotonDelta ecosystem. Main activities include R&D, project management, open innovation and technology transfer.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader Technology Development

profile_positions.description:
● R&D of III-V semiconductor chip technologies for photonic integration
● Project management, including layout of lithography masks, processing of wafers in cleanroom environment, backend processing and characterization of fabricated chips
● Planning of experiments and evaluation of results
● Understanding and solution of design and process problems
● Discussion of requirements with partners and customers
profile_positions.title: Scientist | Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
● Modeling of nanolasers, nanoLEDs, grating couplers, polarization rotator
● Layout of masks for e-beam and optical lithography
● Design of fabrication process flows
● Cleanroom fabrication of PICs in III-V layer stacks bonded to silicon substrates
● Design of InP PICs for FBG sensing via JePPIX (Multi-Project Wafer run of SMART Photonics)
● Characterization of photonic ICs
● Management tasks of EU project (incl. review meetings in European Commission)
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
